mapper.select: SELECT /* UserMapper.selectUserList */ TOP 10 USER_ID AS userId -- 유저ID , USER_NM AS userNm -- 유저명 , USER_PWD AS userPwd -- 유저비밀번호 , REG_DTM AS regDtm -- 등록일시 , UPD_DTM AS updDtm -- 변경일시 , EMAL AS emal -- 이메일 , TEL AS tel -- 전화번호 , GDE AS gde -- 성별 , DEL_YN AS delYn -- 삭제여부 , USER_LVL AS userLvl -- 유저등급 FROM foodroad.dbo.USER_MNGMT_TBL ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC
